alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Lamar; Marion (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 10:32AM CST until March 03 at 10:45AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM CST FOR EASTERN MARION...WESTERN FAYETTE AND SOUTHEASTERN LAMAR COUNTIES... At 1032 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Killen to near Belk, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Winfield, Fayette, Millport, Guin, Brilliant, Glen Allen, Kennedy, Belk, Gu- Win, Bluff, Ashcraft Corner, Blooming Grove, Brinn, Lake Buttahatchee, Crossville, Bear Creek, Twin, Tucker, Cody and Wayside. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for northwestern and west central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
